title: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel
description: Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is a gripping roguelike horde survival game set in mythological Norse realms. Fight fierce battles, earn favor with the gods, and claim your place in Valhalla.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel is an exciting, fast-paced roguelike where players must survive hordes of hellish enemies in arenas inspired by Norse Mythology. Choose from a diverse roster of damned Heroes; from the fearless, axe-wielding Berserker to the cunning and malevolent Seeress - there is more than one way to make it through hell.

Overcome the ultimate trial by fire, ice, and a host of other evils the Norse Underworld, Helheim, has in store. The road is arduous, but the one who endures to the end will become the true champion of the Gods, the destroyer of demons, beasts, and giants: The Jotunnslayer.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Unrelenting, fast-paced battles with enemy hordes
<!--text-->
Wage adrenaline-fueled war against evil that never tires, as endless waves of enemies attack, firmly resolved to halt your advance. Prove yourself worthy and you may earn the chance to summon the unique final boss of each realm. But be warned: the Gods are not easily pleased. True warriors will need to triumph over a series of gruelling trials - mere survival is not enough.

<!--image-->
![Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel-znh9j](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/18f679a82b234692874031d40a3aaea1/jotunnslayer-hordes-of-hel-znh9j.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Complete hellish missions and prove your mettle
<!--text-->
Push yourself that little bit further with each run, as you overcome challenging missions and your journey takes you ever further into the depths of the Nine Worlds. A variety of quests will push you to your limit and beyond, requiring you to complete specific objectives or overcome additional obstacles for even greater rewards - and the favor of the Norse Gods.

<!--image-->
![Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel-1vqwx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/18f679a82b234692874031d40a3aaea1/jotunnslayer-hordes-of-hel-1vqwx.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Experience meaningful progression with unlockable perks
<!--text-->
Upgrade and improve your character with meta-progression systems that offer permanent perks and upgrades. As you continue to play, you'll unlock new abilities, enhancements, and bonuses to customize your playstyle and improve your chances of survival. Seek favour with the mighty Thor, mischievous Loki, wise Freya, and others; prove faithful enough and you will be able to make their strength your own.

<!--image-->
![Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel-6pe1m](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/18f679a82b234692874031d40a3aaea1/jotunnslayer-hordes-of-hel-6pe1m.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Customize gameplay with diverse characters for endless combinations
<!--text-->
Choose from a variety of exciting characters, each with their own unique set of skills, abilities, and weapons. Play the way you want to: crafting the perfect build and adapting to unpredictable challenges as you face the Hordes of Hel. Will you harness the power of rage as the ferocious Berserker, inflict crippling curses on enemies as the Seeress, or make an unlikely pact with an ethereal wolf as the Revenant?

<!--image-->
![Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel-cbfdz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/18f679a82b234692874031d40a3aaea1/jotunnslayer-hordes-of-hel-cbfdz.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Face off with bosses in intense, escalating fights that test your limits
<!--text-->
Confront a wide range of increasingly difficult bosses that threaten the Nine worlds. Outmaneuver and outwit these formidable foes, utilizing the environment and your skill set to gain the upper hand and emerge victorious.

<!--image-->
![Jotunnslayer: Hordes of Hel-16xtg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/18f679a82b234692874031d40a3aaea1/jotunnslayer-hordes-of-hel-16xtg.jpg)
